title: For you madam. [No. 67/07] = Pour vous madame
brief_description: Cinemagazine items including: 1. Wigs and their use. 2. Spring-summer showing. 3. Making sweet-bread tastier. 4. Suzanne Valadon exhibition of paintings. 5. Footage of an introduction to flea markets.
